full_text: Fewer people may mean fewer new ideas—and a very different sort of future than optimists tend to imagine https://t.co/JgcPoyM1iB

localize.full_text: 更少的人可能意味着更少的新想法，也意味着与乐观主义者倾向于想象的截然不同的未来https://t.co/JgcPoyM1iB。
